title: Authorizes town of Brookhaven to establish a housing and community court, and provides for its powers and duties
summary: Authorizes the town of Brookhaven to establish a housing and community court to assist the district court in the disposition of all violations of town laws, codes and ordinances, and provides for its powers and duties.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the town law, in relation to authorizing the town of Brookhaven to establish a housing and community court
